source:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
The intrepid miner has his eye on the disused facilities of Malikah's Well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
水の駅の熱血漢の労働者は、汲み上げ装置の状態を調べたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_000<tab>I've seen you before. Part of the group that went into Malikah's Well, right?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_000<tab>君、もしやマリカの大井戸に向かった方々の一員では？

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_001<tab>Thought so. Thanks to you lot getting rid of the sin eaters around here, there's a chance we might be able to put these remnants of Nabaath Areng to good use.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_001<tab>やはりそうか！
君たちが大井戸の魔物や罪喰いを排除してくれたおかげで、
水の駅の施設を復旧できそうなんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_002<tab>The well was originally dug under the orders of some malikah or the other, I forget which. She used cool water from underground to keep off the desert heat.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_002<tab>かつて、このマリカの大井戸は、
地下水を使って涼を楽しむための施設だった。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_003<tab>Years later, when the mining industry hit its stride, the need for water in the ore washing process led to its expansion. But as you can tell, it's been in a state of disrepair for years now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_003<tab>それが鉱業が大規模化すると、
鉱石洗浄用の水を求めて、現在の形に拡張され、
鉱山鉄道の引き込みなんかも行われたんだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_004<tab>Still, we'd be fools to let the well go to waste, so I'm looking into getting the old machinery working again. Some of it's a bit tricky to get to, though, and I could do with a hand. So, fancy earning a few gil?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_004<tab>さっそく、汲み上げ装置の状態を確認したいんだが、
協力してもらえないかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_005<tab>I need you to inspect the lift for carrying workers and the giant pulley for drawing up water. I'd like to know if they can still be used or if they're rusted to buggery.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_005<tab>俺は地上の操作装置を調べるから、
君は高所にある部分を調べてきてくれ！
そこまで登るには、何か工夫が必要だろうけど……頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_010<tab>What's the matter? Not scared of heights are you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_010<tab>俺は地上の操作装置を調べるから、
君は高所にある部分を調べてくれ！
そこまで登るには、何か工夫が必要だろうけど……頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Although some of the less important parts are in need of replacement, the mechanism itself appears to be in good condition.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>錆びついていて動きそうにない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_030<tab>Hmm... It sounds like it won't take much to have them in working order. When I share the good news with the folk in Twine, I'm sure they'll send a few laborers to help with the repairs.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_030<tab>……なるほど、それなら修理すれば動きそうだな。
これは朗報だ！
使えるとわかれば、ほかの連中だって手伝ってくれるだろう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_031<tab>Getting Malikah's Well producing water again will be a good start, but we'll need the Talos up and running to have any chance of reviving the mining industry in these parts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_031<tab>タロースの復活と合わせれば、
かつてのような大規模採掘だって……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_032<tab>We'd best take it one step at a time, though. And you helping me here was one such step. Your reward, as promised.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH203_03531_MINER03531_000_032<tab>ありがとう！
君のおかげで道筋が見えたよ。
よーし、頑張るぞ！
